document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2008-11
document.heading: AN URGENCY ORDINANCE OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON EXTENDING THE MORATORIUM ON THE CONVERSION OF AN AGE RESTRICTED MOBILEHOME PARK WITHIN THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON TO A NON-AGE RESTRICTED MOBILEHOME PARK FOR A PERIOD OF TEN (10) MONTHS AND FIFTEEN ( 15) DAYS
